title: Krone Gruppe CO2 Emissions Analysis
shortOutcome: Reduced reporting time by 60% using automated carbon footprint calculators.
fullDescription: An end-to-end data analysis project focused on tracking and reporting CO2 emissions for Krone Gruppe's logistics fleet. Developed a Python-based engine to ingest fleet telemetry and output audit-ready reports.

title: GJU Quality Control System
shortOutcome: Automated defect logging leading to a 20% reduction in waste.
fullDescription: Designed a robust SQL-backed Quality Control system for the university's lab factory. Included real-time defect tracking and automated alerts for supervisors.

title: Bosch Telemetry Visualization
shortOutcome: Real-time visibility into eBike performance across 5 regions.
fullDescription: A high-fidelity dashboard developed at Bosch to monitor eBike sensors. Leveraged IoT streams to provide actionable insights for hardware engineers.

title: Production Planning & Scheduling
shortOutcome: Optimized production schedules for a local manufacturer.
fullDescription: Implemented an advanced planning system that integrated with SAP ERP to streamline manufacturing steps, reducing idle time by 15%.
